description: This file sets up an AI agent using the 'agno' framework, configuring its model, tools, instructions, and output formatting for research report generation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, tools, instructions, and output settings.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: Represents a specific language model configuration used by the agent.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: Provides tools for executing external research or data retrieval tasks.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response, optionally streaming the output.
